scripts.database: php spark db:create wizardpos && php spark migrate && php spark db:seed MainSeeder
scripts.seed-month-win: php spark db:seed App\Database\Seeds\Reservations\ReservationSeeder && php spark db:seed App\Database\Seeds\Orders\OrderSeeder
scripts.seed-month-linux: php spark db:seed /Reservations/ReservationSeeder && php spark db:seed /Orders/OrderSeeder
